Maymester Australia and New Zealand

Apply Now
Program Fee: $2,995

Includes the $300 nonrefundable commitment deposit. Does not include UGA tuition or fees, airfare, course materials, or personal spending. Click here for a detailed cost estimate.

Program Dates: May 9 - June 3, 2019

Includes travel days to and from the United States.

Locations:

Sydney, Brisbane, Noosa, Carnarvon Gorge, Lady Elliot Island, Queenstown, Aoraki/Mt. Cook, Kaikoura, and Christchurch.

Overview

Visit two worlds in one program! Travel the east coast of Australia from Sydney to the Great Barrier Reef with a pitstop in the Outback. Experience New Zealand’s “100% Pure” ethos on the South Island from coast to coast with a mountain hiatus in between. An optional add-on 8-day program in Fiji is available to continue your journey abroad.

Click here for a sample itinerary.

Gallery

"I learned more than I ever imagined I could while experiencing the most beautiful, stunning parts of the world. This program really opened my eyes on issues I had never considered before, and I am coming home with a more open mind and broader world view."

— Emily Gronlund, Maymester Australia and New Zealand 2017
